name: CONFORMANCE_info_gain_never_autobind
description: INFO GAIN MUST NEVER AUTO-BIND even with perfect entity+predicate match

setup.comment: Existing claim has year-only date (less specific)

forbidden_outcome.reason: Info gain (adding specificity) must NEVER result in auto-rebind

rationale: This is where hallucinations hide. A model might 'helpfully' add October to a year-only date. If we autobind, we've laundered invented information into the canonical proposition.
failure_scenario: Future optimizer removes info_gain check because 'entity and predicate match perfectly, why not bind?' This test catches that.
